de dag gi nges pa la zhugs pa dang / me tog gi tshogs la mos pa ma gtogs par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub nye bar gyur kyang ring du byed par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po'i thad tu 'gro bar mi bya ste/ skyes bu dam pa de dag la gnod sems bskyed pa de dag ni lo bye bar dmyal ba chen po'i sdug bsngal yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /dud 'gro'i skye
gnas su gyur pa la'ang gnod sems mi skyed do zhes gsungs na skyes bu dam pa de dag lta la ci smos/ shA ri'i bu/ gang dag skyes bu chen po de dag me tog gi tshogs la mos pa de dag la
gnod par byed pa dang / yid ches pa mi skyed pa dang / 'khrug par byed pa dang / brnyas par byed pa de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba'i las shin tu
mi bzang pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed nas de las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni 'jig rten du
'byung ba rab tu rnyed par dka'o/ /de bas na gang dag yang dag par blangs pa la brtan zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed nas zhum par mi byed la/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
rgyas nas ji ltar gnyer ba rnams la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par byed pa de dag ni u dum+bA ra'i me tog dang 'dra'o zhes ngas bshad do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de dag la sogs pa tshad med grangs
med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lho phyogs na da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i phyogs de logs su yan lag lngas phyag byas te mchod la ming ji
skad du bstan pa nyan cing / yon tan yongs su bsgrags pa yid la byas na bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya
stong gi tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med ces bya ba bzhugs te/ shA ri'i bu/ gang
dag de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis dga' ba chen po skyed pa dang / rnam pa brgya stong du yang dag par mos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bsod nams
tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /de dag la log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ste/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag rgyun du
yid la byed pa de dag ni 'chi ba'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu mdun na bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thugs rje chen po de ni sems can rnams la phan par dgongs pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs kyang sems can rnams la bdud sdig can gyis bar chad
byed par 'gyur zhes nas kun nas srung bar mdzad de/ de nas shi 'phos pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyis de nyid du sangs rgyas kyi chos
rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can skye ba theg pa chen po la zhugs
pa de dag gi bsam pa thams cad bdag gis bkang bar bya ste/ de ni gang la la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos byang chub byed pa gang ci yod pa'o/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa can gang dag sangs
rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba de nyid du dgra bcom par gyur cig ces smon lam de ltar btab bo/ /shA ri'i bu/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
phyi ma'i dus na 'od dpag med kyi yon tan brjod pa la dad par byed pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas dga' ba skyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de la lhag pa'i bsam pas rangs par
byed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes te/ de na gnas pa rnams bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing de dag ji ltar brjod pa bzhin byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ro/ /de
bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa de'ang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can skyes pa de dag mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brjod pa de la
yid ches par mi byed pa dang / 'phya ba dang / spong bar 'gyur ba de dag ni bskal pa lngar sems can dmyal ba'i las yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag
stong gi tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams bdud thams cad rab tu bcom pa dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba
mnga' ba zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ shA ri'i bu/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rgyal pa mnga' ba de'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba de dag ni bdud kyi zhags pa thams cad bcad
par 'gyur/ bskal pa drug cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa na/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba de dag
ni sgra dbyangs thams cad kyi smra ba dang ldan par 'gyur/ bdud sdig can yang rgyang ring por yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag bskal pa brgyad du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas pa
'gyur ro// //bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos 'ga' mchis sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ma pham pa/ yod do/ /byang phyogs kyi logs na 'jig rten gyis khams dpal brtsegs pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ ma pham pa/ gang dag de
bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bye ba tshang bar 'khor ba la rgyab kyis
phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /ma pham pa/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po'i mtshan nyan pa ni sangs rgyas lnga bcu'i drung
du spyad pa yin te/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang nam du'ang rdzu 'phrul dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ mya ngan las yongs su ma 'das kyi bar du rna ba dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam
du'ang gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam du'ang gsad pa dang / bcing bar mi 'gyur/ rna ba'i nad mi 'byung / sna nad mi 'byung / lce nad mi 'byung /
lus kyi nad mi 'byung ste/ mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du de dag nam du'ang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas med pa dang / sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang bral bar mi skye ste/ nam du'ang
chos dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam du 'ang mi khom par skye bar mi 'gyur/ nam du'ang bslab pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ nam du'ang dran pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur/ mya ngan las ma 'das
kyi bar du nam du'ang ye shes dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ma pham pa/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba dang / nga'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang yid ches shing mos
pa dang / mngon par dad pa de dag thams cad gnas yongs su gzung bar 'gyur/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchog dang / dam pa dang / rab mchog dang / bla na med pa yang 'gyur ro/ /
de bas na gnas thams cad yongs su 'dzin par 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mchog tu gyur par gnas par 'dod pa dang / dam pa dang / rab mchog tu gyur par gnas
bar 'dod pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i mtshan mnyan par bya'o/ /thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes phyag bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ji tsam du ring /
de bzhin gshegs pa de byung nas ji srid lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham
pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ma pham pa/ 'di lta ste/ dpag tshad brgya khor yug tu bye ma'i phung por gyur pa de las bye ma'i 'bru re re blangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer bzhag
pa rnam grangs des bye ma de dag thams cad rnam par phye la 'jig rten gyi khams gang du bye ma bzhag pa ji snyed yod pa thams cad bye mas yongs su gang bar gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams
bye mas gang ba de dag gi bye ma'i rdul phra rab ji snyed yod pa de bas ches mang zhing ches grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snying po
brtsegs pa zhes bya ba de yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po de
bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /ma pham pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po de mngon par rdzogs
par sangs rgyas nas bskal par lon te/ ma pham pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang gdan 'di nyid la 'dug
bzhin du ngas lhan cig skyes pa'i sha'i mig gis mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de na gdan la bzhugs bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i sha'i spyan gyis mi mjed
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / nga dang / 'khor du bcas pa gzigs so/ /ma pham pa/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sha'i spyan 'di la yid ches pa dang / mos par byed pa dang /
mngon par dad par byed pa dang / nga'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang dad par byed pa dang / mngon par dad par byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i smon lam gyis byin gyis rlabs yongs su
rdzogs pa la yid ches par byed pa dang / mos par byed pa dang / nem nur mi byed pa dang / the tshom mi za ba de dag gis 'jig rten thams cad las bye brag tu 'phags pa'i chos thams cad
yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de bas na/ ma pham pa/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos
de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs mnyan pa'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di mes yongs su gang
pa las kyang brgal te 'gro bar bya'o/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /yang
bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos gcig dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba mchis sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma pham pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ma pham pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
gcig dang ldan na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos gcig po yod do/ /ma pham pa/ byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa 'das nas 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje'i snying po can zhes bya ba na/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /ma pham pa/ gang dag
de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rjes rab tu 'joms pa de'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing / bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di mthu che'o/ /ma pham pa/ ngas mngon par shes pa de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad las de bzhin gshegs pa
de'i mtshan thos nas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par byas par gyur to/ /ma pham pa/ gal te ngas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de
las de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos par ma gyur na/ nga 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rdo rjes rab tu
'joms pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ji lta bu zhe na/ ma pham pa/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu'am/ rdo ba'am/ bong ba'am/ gseg ma'am/ gyo mo'am/ sa'ang rung rdo rjes bcom ste
nang du 'gro ba de bzhin du/ ma pham pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba dang / 'di'i byin gyi rlabs pa dang / nga'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dad par 'gyur ba de
dag so so'i skye bo'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thams cad kyang rnam par gtor cing rnam par bshig/ mngon par bcom zhing dral te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob
par 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir de'i ming rdo rjes rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar smon lam phun sum tshogs shing de bzhin gshegs pa de bsam gyis mi
khyab pa'i yon tan dang ldan no/ /byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba brgya stong gi tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu snang ba can zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan nyan par 'gyur ba nges pa la zhugs pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams de na nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang yang med de/ de dag thams cad
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen me la bsnyen bkur byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la bka'
stsal pa/ 'od srung / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa mnga' pa'o/ /'od srung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag lnga bcu rtsa lnga'i tha ma na 'jig rten gyi khams
a ga ru'i dri zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs te/ 'od srung / gang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
mtshan rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos thos na skye ba las rnam par log pa'i byin gyi rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob ste/ de la gnas na gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas grangs
med pa rnams mthong ba dang / de dag gis bshad pa kun 'dzin pa dang / chos ci 'dra ba nyan cing smra bar 'dod pa de 'dra bar thos shing smra bar 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bcom ldan
'das de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa yin te/ gang dag gis bdag gi ming thos na des ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par gyur cig ces de'i smon lam de ltar btab bo/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'di nas stong phrag lnga bcu na/ /'jig rten khams ni legs sprul pa/ /a ga ru yi dri zhes bya/ /spos ngad rtag tu ldang ba na/ /rin
chen zla ba dam pa'i 'od/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de na bzhugs/ /'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yi/ /gang gis de yi mtshan thos pa/ /skye ba gcig gis thogs gyur cing / /byin gyis rlob
ces bya ba yi/ /ting 'dzin dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /rtag par kun tu snang bar byed/ /ting nge 'dzin 'di thob nas ni/ /srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/ /gzhal med chos kyang ston pa yi/ /
'jig rten 'dren pa rnams kyang mthong / /chos kun snying po med par ni/ /'jig rten mgon pos rab tu bstan/ /tshig 'di yang dag 'dzin pa rnams/ /sems can dag ni dge ba skyes/ /khams
kun dngos po med par yang / /de yi khams la rnam par lta/ /chos gang mtshan nyid med pa la/ /dngos po med par yongs su smra/ /dngos po de ni mi rnyed de/ /
dngos po med pa'ang de 'dra zhing / /bdag med pas na snying po med/ /de ltar de ni chos rnams ston/ /chos gang rab tu ston pa yang / /de ni bden pa bla med de/ /de phyir de yi ye shes 'jug /
mi shes pa la'ang de bzhin no/ /mi shes pa dang ye shes dang / /gnyis po 'di ni yod ma yin/ /'di la chos ni rnam byang med/ /nyon mongs pa yang yod ma yin/ /chos kun gtan la bab
par ni/ /de ltar mgon po rab tu ston/ /gnas pa med par rab bshad nas/ /sangs rgyas gnas pa med par 'gyur/ /gang tshe byang chub 'gyur ba la/ /chos rnams de yis mi rnyed cing / /byang
chub sems dpa' mi gnas pa/ /de ltar mang du thos pa yin/ /sgra dang don kyang med pa ste/ /mkhas pa de la mi rtog go /mang du thos pas de rgyags shing / /'jig rten dag na mi rtsod do/ /
'od srung / byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag drug cu 'das nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'od srung / de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos nas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag phyir mi
ldog cing skye bo thams cad la sdug par 'gyur ba dang / 'du bar 'gyur ba dang / tshigs 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i las de dag gis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/ /spobs pa'ang zab mor
'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag la chos ston pa de dag chos ston pa de la mos par 'gyur ro/ /bud med kyis kyang thos na de bud med kyi dngos po'i mtha' mar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /stong phrag dag ni drug cur yang / /tshang zhing chad pa med pa'i zhing / /rab tu dga' zhes bya ba yi/ /'jig rten khams ni legs
par gnas/ /de nas sangs rgyas bzhugs pa ni/ /chos rnams kun gyi pha rol phyin/ /bzang mchog dpal zhes bya ba yi/ /'jig rten mgon po bla na med/ /lhar gyur pa yi skyob pa ste/ /de
yi mtshan ni thos nas su/ /gang dang gang du skyes par yang / /sdug cing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /tshig btsun shes rab mchog dang ldan/ /srog chags rnams la chos ston te/ /chos de
rab tu thos nas kyang / /dga' ba dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas dag ni mtshan 'di ni/ /bud med dag gis thos na yang / /bud med skye gnas 'jigs chen gyi/ /skye gnas las ni
yongs su thar/ /gang la 'jig rten ma rtogs pa/ /zab cing shin tu mkhas pa dang / /ji ltar dri med go 'phang bzhin/ /de lta bu yi sems su 'gyur/ /ji bzhin pa dang ji bzhin min/ /de dag
gnyis ka dngos po med/ /chos gang skyo bar gyur pa la/ /de la brjod pa ga la yod/ /'od srung / 'di nas byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag brgyad
cu'i pha rol na 'jig rten gyi khams legs par 'jug pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo la bzhud pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/
rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos de'i mtshan thos na/ tshe 'phos nas gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa dang / sems can rnams mthong na dga' ba dang / sdug cing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur
ro| |bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran zhing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'gro ba thams cad dang / skye ba thams cad du bla na med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing
rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston to/ /de'i smon lam dang / mig kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /stong phrag
dag ni brgyad cu yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni tshang pa na/ /bde bar 'jug pa'i 'jig rten khams/ /de ni shin tu bzang ba ste/ /de na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa ni/ /'jig rten mgon po bla na med pa/ /
rin chen pad mo bzhud ces bya/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/ /de yi mtshan kyang thos nas ni/ /de yi mig ni rnam dag cing / /gzugs kyang shin tu bzang por 'gyur/ /blta na
sdug pa'ang de bzhin no/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /nyan thos rnams kyang gnas pa ni/ /rnam par thar pas zhi bar gyur/ /de la 'jig rten rtogs mi 'gyur/ /lo stong du yang tshang ba
dang | |ting nge 'dzin las langs nas kyang / /sangs rgyas de yi nyan thos rnams/ /ji ltar gnas pas gnas par byed/ /bzang mchog sangs rgyas de yi mtshan/ /thos nas de 'dra de ltar 'gyur/ /
de yi mtshan 'di 'dir thos nas/ /de dag bskal pa grangs med par/ /yon tan rjes su myong bar 'gyur/ /de tshe dpa' bos yon tan shes/ /spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yis/ /mdo sde shin tu
bzang po rnams/ /ma chags thogs pa med pa'i tshig /srog chags rnams la chos ston to/ /yang 'od srung / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi
mtshan rnams rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag nyan pa/ 'od srung / bud med kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos na/ bud med kyi dngos po las 'gyur ba ngas sngar bshad pa dang
'dra bas re zhig gzhag go /ji ltar yon tan bye brag med par bshad pa de dag thams cad kyi go skabs su 'gyur te/ mtshan 'di dag thos na yon tan gyi khyad par ji skad du bshad pa rnams 'dzin
to| /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'dod pa'i sred pa chad pa dang / /kun tu sbyor ba zad pa yi/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag /mnyan cing rtogs
par byed pa ni/ /yon tan khyad par shin tu mang / /tshe 'phos yon tan 'di dag 'byung / /'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yi/ /mtshan rnams thos par gyur nas ni/
bud med smon lam 'di 'debs na/ /de tshe skyes bu mchog tu 'gyur/ /bud med dngos po 'dir 'dod pas/ /'jig rten ma rung 'gyur ba yi/ /bud med dngos po rnam par ldog/ myur du sems
can rnams kyi ni/ /bla med dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'gyur/ /mi gang 'dod pa spong ba ni/ /bsod nams rnam pa mang po skyed/ /bdag nyid dang ni pha rol dag /dge ba la ni 'jog byed pa/ /
sdug bsngal dag las yongs su thar/ /bud med yang dang yang du ni/ /bud med dngos po spang ba dang / /yongs su thar par 'dod pa ni/ /ji ltar grong khyer dbus su yang / /dug gi shing
chen yod pa las/ /de yang shin tu gcad gyur na/ /srog chags rnams ni bde bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin dug gi dngos po yi/ /bud med dngos po sdig pa la/ /sdig pa de ni rab spangs na/ /
sangs rgyas lam la rab tu gnas/ /bdag gis dngos dang sems can dngos/ /'di dag gnyis ka mi rnyed de/ /gang la sdom pa mi rnyed pa/ /de ni bla na med pa'i lam/ /skyes pa'am yang
na bud med kyang / /dam pa'i don du yod ma yin/ /gang la dngos po mi rnyed pa/ /der ni smon lam sbyangs pa yin/ /smon lam dag ni med pa la/ /rnam par shes pa 'byung ba med/ /de
ni dam pa'i mtha' yin te/ /dmigs pa med pa nyid du 'gyur/ /bud med dngos po sems kyis brtags/ /sems de nyid kyang ma rnyed de/ /sems nyid de ni mi rnyed na/ /bla na med pa'i smon
lam yin/ /bud med dngos po spang ba'i phyir/ /gang su mngon par brtson byed pa/ /kun tu rtog la spyod pa ste/ /kun nas ldang la de gnas so/ /bud med dngos por gang brjod pa/ /dngos po de ni
yod ma zin/ /de ltar rab tu shes pa ni/ /bstan pa dag la de sbyor ro/ /sbyor ba dang ni mi sbyor dang / /de dag gnyis ka ci yang med/ /chos rnams yod pa ma yin pa/ /de ni sbyor ba zhes kyang bya/ /
'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yi/ /mtshan 'di rab tu thos nas ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi drung du yang / /dge ba mang po skyed par byed/ /thams cad gzigs kyi mtshan kun dang / /de lta bu yi ming
thos nas/ /gang dang gang du skyed par yang / /yon tan 'di dag yongs su 'dzin/ /gang nyan de dag ngas mthongs te/ /lung nod pa yang ngas mthong ngo / /ngas ni de dag mang mthong ba/ /de la gang
dag ma mos shing / /'di ni sangs rgyas ma bshad ces/ /de skad gang smra ngas mthong ste/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams spangs nas su/ /sems can dmyal ba mang por 'gro/ /'jig rten gnyen
gyi chos rnams ni/ /rab tu spang ba byas nas kyang / /sdig pa'i las rnams byas pas na/ /sdig pa'i 'gro ba dag tu 'gro /glen zhing lkugs la blun pa dang / /dbang po nyams pa'ang de bzhin
te| |byang chub sems ni rnam spangs nas/ /de dag sems kyang g.yengs par 'gyur/ /dbang thang chung zhing mdog kyang ngan/ /gzi brjid nyams zhing blta mi sdug/
sdig pa dman pa'i skye gnas su/ /mi de skye bar 'gyur ba yin/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /bshad pa'i chos ni de mi shes/ /zab mo la yang mi 'jug ste/ /'bras bu chos kyis
phongs par 'gyur/ /chos kyis phongs pa thos nas ni/ /mi de shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po 'od mdzad pa/ /ye shes chen po mi mnyes byed/ /dge slong rnams dang de
bzhin du/ /dge bsnyen rnams la go bar bya/ /chos la 'gal bar gang byed pa/ /phongs pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lo/ /phyogs bcu yi ni 'jig rten na/ /sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams bzhugs
shing | |gang na skye bo yod pa der/ /zab mo yi ni chos ston to/ /de phyir 'jig rten mgon po la/ /mos pa dag kyang rab tu skyed/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chags med chos/ /'dren pa
dag ni chos gsungs te/ /de dag gi ni mtshan 'di la/ /su dag mos par 'gyur ba ni/ /mkhas pa de dag bsod nams kyang / /dpag tu med dang ldan par 'gyur/ /mi gang 'dir ni 'di
lta yis/ /mtshan rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ba ni/ /spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / /mkhas par yang ni rab tu 'gyur/ /'di lta bu yi mtshan rnams kyang / /chags med gyur nas
rab ston na/ /'jig rten kun gyis bkur ba dang / /tshig btsun par yang rtag tu 'gyur/ /phyogs bzhir de yi mtshan 'di rnams/ /gang dag rab tu brjod pa ni/ /gang dang / gang du skyes par
yang | |de ni 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas mtshan rnams thos nas kyang / /mi gang 'dir ni 'di lta yi/ /mtshan rnams mchod par byed pa ni/ /de la byang chub rgyang mi ring / /su
dag 'di lta'i mtshan rnams la/ /skye bo mang po 'dzud byed pa/ /'jig rten mgon po'i spyod yul ni/ /de la rnyed par dka' ma yin/ /'od srung / chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni mtshan
'di dag la mos par 'gyur ro/ /bzhi gang zhe na/ des sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin/ zab mo la mos pa yin/ dben par mos pa yin/ dge ba'i
bshes gnyen la bsten cing dam pa'i chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las ma byas ma bsags pa yin no/ /'od srung / chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gi mtshan rnams la mos par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /
des sngon rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /mthong zhing mchod par byas pa yin/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis/ /de dag mtshan rnams thos par 'gyur/ /zab mo la yang rab mos shing / /
nga yi sangs rgyas chos la nyan/ /sngon gyi las rnams yongs dag pas/ /de nas 'dir ni 'ongs pa ste/ /sngon yang mdo sde bshad pa la/ /de dag yid gnyis
yong med de/ /yang dag rdzogs pas bshad pa yi/ /mdo sde de la 'gal mi byed/ /nyi tshe ba yi bzod pa la/ /'dren pa dag ni mos par byed/ /shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis kyang / /ngas
bshad pa la mnyan par gyis/ /gdams pa dag la mngon dga' zhing / /chos nyid la ni 'brang bar bya/ /de dag chos su 'du shes pas/ /chos de thams cad sdud par byed/ /'du
shes pa dang 'dus shes med/ /de dag yod pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yul rnams ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rtog par byed/ /de dag gi ni chos nyid 'di/ /zab mo la ni gang
mos shing / /mos pa dag ni mang gyur ba/ /de dag la ni rtsod pa med/ /zab mo spyod pa de dag la/ /yid gnyis dag ni yong med do/ /nor la sred pa gter dang yang / /'dra bar 'gyur ba
ma yin no/ /'jig rten gyi ni mgon po la/ /su dag nem nur skye ba ni/ /dbang po rtul zhing myos pa dang / /mi brtson par ni rig par bya/ /gang dag mos par gyur pa ni/ /de dag la yang yid
gnyis med/ /'di dag 'gog par byed pa ni/ /mngon par brtson pa'i 'bras bu med/ /sangs rgyas mtshan ni legs bshad pa/ /de lta bu yi mtshan thos nas/ /sangs rgyas dag gi
bsngags ba smra/ /phyogs bcu dag na 'jig rten mgon/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan bstod de/ /yang dang yang du sangs rgyas kyi/ /mtshan rnams mi gang dran byed pa/ /de ni myur du dri med
'gyur/ /srog chags rnams kyis bkur ba yin/ /chags pa med pa'i spobs pa yis/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ston/ /'od srung / steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i bla ma
zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser snang bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /'od srung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
nas steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rtsod pa la dga' ba mdog ngan brtsegs pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma pham pa'i
dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams slob dpon dang ldan pa zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad
med pa'i bla ma bde bar gshegs pa rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma rlan pa'i glang po dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu mdzes pa rtog pa'i byang chub ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus grangs med pa la zhugs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs
na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'dzin pa med pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dgongs pa brjod kyis mi lang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs
so| |steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams tshangs par spyod pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gti mug med pa'i
spos dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma snang ba zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla
ba dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams chos mchog ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rnam par mi rtog pa'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams chos spyod ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba gsog pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod pa yongs su dag pa'i tog ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya bde na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gter legs par gnas pa zhi ba rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams brtson 'grus skyes pa zhes
bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams smon lam
gyi stobs zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shes rab kyis sped pa'i dpal zhes bya bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig
rten gyi khams mdangs dga' ba'i phyogs zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtam shin tu yongs su dag pa mdzad pa zhes
bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams tsan+dan gyi dri'i phug ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai DUR+ya'i
snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kun tu yon tan rin po ches rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan tshad med dpal zhes bya ba de na/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan shin tu yongs su dag pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams
nyan thos ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen snang bas rnam par gnon pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba bzhugs
so| |steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams gnyid med pa'i mig ces bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa'i khrel yod pa
gser dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sangs rgyas dpal gyi zla ba can/ /rgyal chen mi yi khyu
mchog ste/ /sangs rgyas khyu mchog de dag ni/ /chos kun rnam par spyod pa mdzad/ /sangs rgyas de dag ming rnams kyis/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam par spyod/ /mi gang de yi mtshan
rnams ni/ /bskal pa 'dir ni nyan 'gyur zhing / /gang dag dad par 'gyur ba dang / /de la ri mor bcas pa dag /de dag dpa' bo shes rab che/ /de dag sangs rgyas dam par 'gyur
de dag ye shes mtha' yas te/ de la ne ma nur ma byed cig / /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu mdzes pa'i pad+ma zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de'i mtshan thos na ngan song gsum yang bcad par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi me tog kyang
legs par rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de dag bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug tu 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs
so| |'jig rten khams ni legs brgyan pa/ /pad+ma shin tu mdzes zhes bya/ /lha yi dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du/ /rtag par shin tu brgyan pa ste/ /de nas sangs rgyas bzhugs pa ni/ /
pad+ma bla dpal mkhas pa ste/ /sangs rgyas zhing der rnam par 'phrul/ /srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston/ /skyes pa dang ni bud med kyis/ /de yi mtshan kyang thos nas ni/ /ngan song
gsum ni rnam spong zhing / /sangs rgyas dag kyang mang po mthong / /bskal pa sum cu rtsa drug 'dor/ /'dus byas rnams kyang rnam par bzlog /sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub las/ /phyir
yang ldog par mi 'gyur ro/ /long ba zha bor mi 'gyur te/ /blun por rtag tu de mi 'gyur/ /'jig rten kun na rnam par dag cing / /shes rab bsod nams shin tu 'phel/ /de bzhin
gshegs la phyag byas na/ /sdig pa'i grogs po mi 'phel zhing / /gsod dang phyir rgol de bzhin te/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur/ /
sangs rgyas de dang 'jig rten gyi/ /mchod rten gzhan la phyag byas na/ /chos kun rtogs par rig pa yis/ /byang chub la ni nem nur med/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams
rin po che sgrol ma zhes bya ba de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen dam pa 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de'i mtshan
thos na byang chub kyi yan lag rin chen bdun thob par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa sum cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /rin chen sgrol ma 'jig ten khams mchog na/ /rin chen 'byung zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas te/ /de yi mtshan mchog dam pa thos nas ni/ /
srog chags rnams kyis byang chub yan lag thob/ /bskal pa sum cu dag ni 'dor bar byed/ /byang chub la yang shin tu legs par gnas/ /smra ba dpa' bo rab tu mi bskyod pa/ /
skyes bu dam pa dag kyang mang du mthong / /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams glog gi 'od ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas glog gi sgron ma tog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de'i mtshan thos na mi khom pa thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag bskal pa nyi shur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs
pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe yang rgya/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi zhing de na/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po ni/ /glog 'od
tog gi rgyal zhes bya/ /pad+mo dam pa legs par byung / /de yi mtshan yang thos nas ni/ /mi khom thams cad rnam par spong / /bskal pa nyid shur 'dor bar byed/ /myur du byang chub 'tshang
yang rgya/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi shing ta la rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ta la'i
rgyal po mngon par 'phags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de'i mtshan thos na sems can thams cad las mngon par 'phags par 'gyur ro/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi
khams ta la nam mkha' la nye ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos nam mkha'i sgron ma zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de'i
mtshan thos na bskal pa drug cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyi phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang dag par 'gro ba las kyang phyir mi ldog go /tshe 'di la de bzhin gshegs
pa mthong ba'ang thob par 'gyur ro/ /tha na rmi lam na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa de la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pas ri mo byed par 'gyur ro/ /blta bar bya ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yang
rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag thob par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ni yon tan dang / phan yon tshad med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /nam mkha' yongs su brgyan pa'i zhing / /de na grags chen sangs rgyas ni/ /chos kyi nam mkha' sgron ma'i mtshan/ /skyes
bu dag ni khyu mchog ste/ /de yi mtshan kyang thos nas ni/ /bskal pa drug cu phyir bzlog cing / /bla med sangs rgyas chos rnams dang / /sangs rgyas 'gro ba'ang thob par 'gyur/ /
sangs rgyas dpa' bo chen po dag /tshe 'di nyid la mthong bar 'gyur/ /lhag pa'i bsam pas byams pa'i sems/ /dkyil 'khor lnga yis phyag byas te/ /rmi lam na yang rdzogs
sangs rgyas/ /kun tu bzang po mthong bar 'gyur/ /yid kyi rtog pa gzhan gyis sems/ /chos kyi rgyal po dran nas su/ /shes la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams/ /bsnyen bkur bya
ba rnyed par 'gyur/ /de ni tshe 'di'i yon tan te/ /ston pa yon tan tshad med cing / /chos kun gyi yang pha rol phyin/ /phun sum tshogs pa kun gnyer bas/ /byams pa'i sems kyis phyag
gyis shig/ steng gi phyogs na shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad
'byung ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de shin tu rnam par phye ba zhes bya zhe na/ 'jig rte gyi khams de gzhi gser la bai DUR+yas mig mangs ris su bris
pa| mig mangs ris thams cad nas me tog gi shing dang / rin po che'i shing dang / tsan+dan la sogs pa spos kyi shing dag gis shin tu rnam par phye zhing de dag las dri byung bas sangs
rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gdugs gcig tu khyab par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad 'byung ba de chos kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'i mtshan thos nas dbang po
thams cad rab tu rnam par phye ba yongs su 'dzin to/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu rnam par phye ba'ang yongs su 'dzin to/ /bskal pa brgyad cur 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par yang
byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams ni bla med pa/ /shin tu rna par phye zhes bya/ /shing gis
mig mangs ris su byas/ /spos kyi shing gis shin tu mdzes/ /de dag las ni dri byung bas/ /sa kun tu yang rgyas par 'gyur/ /gdugs gcig
tu ni byas nas su/ /bar snang la yang de gnas so/ /de la sangs rgyas bzhugs pa ni/ /yon tan yan lag thams cad 'byung / /ming mtshan shin tu phun sum tshogs/ /chos kyi rgyal
po 'jigs med de/ /de yi mtshan kyang thos nas ni/ /yan lag thams cad mdzes par 'gyur/ /byad bzhin bzang zhing blta na sdug/ gzugs mdzes mthong na dga' ba dang / /shin tu
phye ba'i lus su 'gyur/ /chu zheng gab pa n+ya gro bzhin/ /dpal gyis shin tu 'bar gyur cing / /sangs rgyas dag gi zhing du 'gro /bskal pa brgyad cur 'dor bar byed/ /'dus byas rnams
kyang rnam par zlog /sangs rgyas chos rnams phye ba yang / /rnam pa thams cad myur du 'thob/ /yon tan yan lag kun 'byung ba/ /sangs rgyas rjes su dran byas na/ /yon tan phan yon
dag pa ni/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi go 'phang gnas/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po'i mchog ces bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal
po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ de'i mtshan thos na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gis bskal pa lnga bcur 'khor ba brgyab kyis phyogs pa byas
par 'gyur ro/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'jig rten khams ni bzang mchog ste/ /bzang po dga' ba zhes kyang bya/ /de na rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas ni/ /bzang tog rgyal mtshan drang srong ste/ /rgyal mchog chos kyi rgyal po yin/ /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan/ /de yi mtshan kyang thos nas ni/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams
mi 'bri zhing / /bskal pa dag ni lnga bcur yang / /'khor ba dag ni rnam par spong / /'jig rten du yang myur bar ni/ /grags chen lha yi lhar 'gyur ro/ /steng gi phyogs na 'jig rten gyis
khams rin po che'i rigs zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /ci'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de rin po
che'i rigs zhes bya zhe na/ 'od srung / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par rab tu zhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
de nas se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams byang chub tu
yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed cing phyir yang 'jig rten gyi khams der 'ong ngo / /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'od
srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i ming ji skad bgyi ba dag mchis/ bcom
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ seng ge rnam par rol pa dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings dang / seng ge'i tog dang / seng ge rnam par sprul pa dang / shin tu brtan
pa'i mthu rtul dang / rdo rje'i blo gros mtshon cha dang / 'od srung / de lta bu la sogs pa rtag tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gi ming gang su dag gis
thos par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams thob
par 'gyur ro/ /rin po che'i rigs kyang rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'ang rnyed par 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa brgya tshang bar 'khor ba la rgyab
kyis phyogs pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /'jig rten khams ni rin chen rigs/ /rigs chen kun
gyis brgyan pa ste/ /de na sangs rgyas bzhugs pa ni/ /dpa' bo dag gis yongs su bskor/ /'jig rten sgron ma de mtshan ni/ /rin chen kun gyis 'phags pa ste/ /rab tu
brgyan pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ /chos tog rgyal mtshan drang srong ste/ /byang chub sems dpas yongs bskor cing / /'dren pa chos rnams ston pa mdzad/ /'jig rten du ni ma bskor ba/ /phyir
mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bskor/ /de yi mtshan kyang thos nas ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang mi 'khor zhing / /phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yang / /bla na med pa thob par 'gyur/ /gang dag
gis ni mtshan brjod pa/ /chos kyi rgyal po de dag dang / /rab 'byung dag na bzhugs pa dang / /'jig rten dag gis khams kyang rung / /ming dang rigs ni rnam par dag /spyod pa dag
kyang rnam dag pa/ /chos kyi spyan ni rnam par dag /chos rnams kun kyang rnam sbyangs pa/ /shes rab ldan pa'i spyod yul gyis/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes la/ /skye bo mang po gang dag
ni| /shin tu 'dod pa'i shA ri'i bu/ /gang dag phyi ma'i dus byung ba/ /shin tu 'jigs par gyur pa'i tshe/ /chos 'di rab tu nyan 'gyur zhing / /thos nas dad par byed pa ni/ /the
tshom med par de dag gis/ /shA ris nga la bsnyen bkur byas/ /ji ltar rin chen rin thang med/ /dbul pos mthong na zhum gyur te/ /gang gis rin chen rnyed 'gyur ba/ /de lta'i nor
ni ga las 'ong / /de bzhin bla med sangs rgyas kyang / /bsod nams chung ngus thos nas ni/ /mig la gnod byed blo can rnams/ /de dag dad par ga la 'gyur/ /nor dang mdzod rnams
mang po dag /nor bu rin chen thos nas ni/ /shin tu brgyan par bya'o zhes/ /de dag yang dang yang tshol lo/ /de bzhin shes rab chen po yang / /sangs rgyas
kyis ni mtshan thos nas/ /ji ltar byang chub reg 'gyur zhes/ /de dag yongs su tshol bar byed/ /dman pa'i las dang ldan pa dang / /sdig pa 'dod dang g.yo can dang / /shes rab
bsod nams med pa la/ /'di lta bu yi thos pa med/ /'dod chags kyis ni chags gyur dang / /gti mug gis ni rmongs pa'am/ /chags pas zil gyis mnon pa la/ /'di lta bu
yi thos pa med/ /nga rgyal can dang khengs pa dang / /le lo can dang blo chung dang / /mu stegs gzhan la brtson pa la/ /'di lta bu yi thos pa med/ /bye ba stong gi lha rnams ni/ /kye ma
sangs rgyas kye ma chos/ /kye ma dge 'dun bla na med/ /de zhes de tshe sgra yang sgrog /me tog gi yang char 'bebs shing / /stong gsum 'dir ni rab tu gtor/ /sil snyan bye ba dkrol
bar byed/ /spos kyis sa la chag chag btab/ /zhing 'di snang bar byed nas ni/ /rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byas/ /me tog bsags pa dam pa yi/ /mdo sde 'di ni rab bshad pa/ /
de ni 'khor su gang dag ni/ /sangs rgyas mtshams gnas ma gtogs par/ /gang gzhan thos pa thams cad ni/ /sangs rgyas bla na med par 'gyur/ phyogs bcu dag ni thams
cad du/ /gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing nas ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' lhags nas su/ /mnyan nas phyir yang so sor dong / /mdo sde 'di ni bshad pa'i tshe/ /dge slong bye ba mang tshang pa/ /de dag thams
cad dgra bcom 'gyur/ /de dag gis ni 'dren pa mthong / /dge slong dag ni brgya stong dang / /dge slong ma yang de bzhin te/ /stong phrag drug cur tshang ba yis/ /de tshe chos la bzod pa thob/ /
mi skye ba yi chos rnams la/ /bzod pa bla na med thob nas/ /de dag sangs rgyas rnams blta zhing / /srog chags rnams la chos kyang 'chad/ /dge slong ma ni lnga brgya dang / /dge bsnyen ma ni
bzhi bcu dag/ rang rang gi ni gos rnams kyis/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi sku la gsol/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yi rangs
so| |byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bshad pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa me tog gi tshogs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang /
zhus chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he d+harma tA shI la la sogs pas zhus chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpang skong phyag brgya
pa zhes bya ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na dus gsum du gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub
sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa rab 'byams ma lus pa'i dkon mchog thams cad la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang shar mtshams kyi sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shar lho mtshams kyi sangs rgyas
pad+mo dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho nub mtshams kyi sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /nub byang mtshams kyi sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas pad+mo'i dpal de bzhin
gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma phyogs kyi sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin
gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung ldan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin
gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa'i sde dga' ba'i rgyal po de
bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas tshe mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal
lo| |sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUR+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas sA la'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rin po che'i dpal gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal
lo| |sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ut+pa la
rgyas pa bsung gi tog gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ngur smrig gi rgyal mtshan gyi 'jig rten na/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje snying pos rab
tu 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo bsgrags pa'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas rab tu gdon mi za ba pad+mo rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin
gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdul med pa'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas seng ge de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab tu snang ba'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas
rin po che'i gtsug phud de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'od bzang po'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal
lo| |'da' bar dka' ba'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer rab tu rgyas pa'i sku de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab tu bzang po'i 'jig rten na/ sangs
rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa'i blo gros 'od zer gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /me long gi dkyil 'khor bsgrags pa'i 'jig rten na/ sangs rgyas zla
ba'i thugs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pad+mo dpal gyi 'jig rten na sangs rgyas dpal bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i bar thams cad la phyag 'tshal
lo/ /sangs rgyas zla 'od de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mdzes chen de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi dkyil 'khor dbang
po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas dga' ba'i spyan de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas rgya mtsho'i dpal de bzhin gshegs
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser gyi gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa'i yon tan gyi 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas smon lam thams cad las byung ba'i rin po che'i gzi brjid shin tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs
rgyas grags pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rdo rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gtsug tor can de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i
dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas log par dad sel de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas gser thub de bzhin gshegs
pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /da
ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i dpal rnam par snang mdzad chen
po thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas chos kyi sku mu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i sku gzugs thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ring
bsrel thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mchod rten thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam pa'i chos mdo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal
lo| |lung du bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ched du brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gleng gzhi'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rtogs
pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa brjod pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyes pa rabs kyi sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shin tu rgyas pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rmad du byung
ba'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos rtogs pa bstan pa'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod theg pa chen po'i mdzod thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs
bcu dus gsum gyi gsung rab thams cad dang / 'dul ba thabs kyi sgo mo ma lus pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' brjod du med pa la phyag
'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs te dam pa'i chos kyi yi ge thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shar phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa'
mya ngan med pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nub phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bas byin la phyag
'tshal lo/ /byang shar mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shar lho mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad+mo
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lho nub mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nub byang mtshams kyi byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mchog la phyag
'tshal lo/ /'og gi phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' pad mo dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas byin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems
dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i
snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
dri ma med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /shes rab chen po'i mchog 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po'i mchog 'phags pa maud+gal gyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
mang du thos pa'i mchog 'phags pa kun dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi mchog 'phags pa 'od srung la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bslab pa la gus pa'i mchog
'phags pa nor sbyin 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dul ba 'dzin pa'i mchog 'phags pa nye bar 'khor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan mnga' ba'i mchog 'phags pa ma
'gags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dri zhing lan ldon pa'i mchog 'phags pa rab 'byor la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa dgra bcom pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa
rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu'i dge 'dun bzhugs so 'tshal thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la dad pas phyag btsal nas/ /sdig pa
kun byang dge tshogs rnam par 'phel/ /bcom ldan so so'i bka' las ci 'byung ba/ /yon tan khyad par can de grub par shog/ phyogs bcu'i dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo//
bstod cing bsngags so/ /blta zhing brtag go /byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams rab 'byams las byung ba mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs mchog /gtso bo/ dam
pa| khyad par can/ bzang po/ gya nom pa/ bla na med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pas phyogs bcu'i snod kyi 'jig rten byur bur bkang ste/ chos kyi mchod pa dang bcas pas ma lus/
mi lus/ lus pa med pa'i dkon mchog gsum la phyi ma'i mu'i mthar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mchod cing 'don to/ /dbul zhing gsol lo/ /bkur stir bgyi'o/ /bla mar bgyi'o/ /ri
mor bgyi'o/ /mnyes par bgyi'o/ /bdag cag gi skye ba 'di dang / thog ma dang / tha ma ma mchis pa nas srid pa gsum gyi 'khor ba na 'khor zhing 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug
gsum gyi dbang gis lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi sgo nas mi dge ba bcu dang / mtshams med pa lnga la sogs te/ gsung rab kun las 'gal ba'i
sdig pa mi dge ba'i las bdag gis ci bgyis pa dang / gzhan la bcol ba dang / gzhan bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag rdul tsam bag tsam yang ma lus par mthol zhing bshags
so| |sbyangs zhing bsal to/ /gzhig cing gdon to/ /mi 'chab bo/ /mi sbed do/ /mi bsnyen mi bgyid do/ /de nas de'i tshe sdig pa thams cad ni byang / bsod nams thams cad ni rdzogs
te| dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ dgongs pa'i dbang gis ched du sprul pa ma gtogs par nam nam zhar zhar tshe tshe rabs rabs su ngan song gsum
la sogs te/ bgegs rigs thams cad du mi skye zhing mi ltung bar shog cig/ log pa mi dge ba'i las la mi phyogs mi bgyid par shog cig/ las dang / nyon mongs pa'i
rgyu la mi phyogs mi bgyid par shog cig /smad pa'i lus dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu kun las thar nas phyin chad mi myong bar shog cig /dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying
po la mchis kyi bar du sgo gsum nas dge ba chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad par shog cig /tshe rabs gar skye sa kyang bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan te sems can
thams cad kyi don bya la mthu dang /dbang yod par shog cig /gang de bzhin gshegs pa 'ba' zhig gi thugs su chud pa'i chos bla na med pa'i byang chub tu gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya
ba'i don de kho na nyid gang yin pa deng dag gis kyang ma nor bar khong du chud cing bsgoms la gzhan dag la'ang ma nor bar ston cing 'dren par shog cig /dus 'di nas nam byang chub
kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi ste/ bdag nyid lus dbul gyi/ thugs rje chen po ldan pa rnams kyis so so nas rtag tu bzhes shig/ ji ltar
na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dngos po thams cad dang bral ba phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyis ma zin pa'i chos bdag med pa dang mnyam pa/ thog ma
nas ma skyes pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ltar bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang / dus 'di nas nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du byang
chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o/ /byang chub kyi sems ni nam gzhar yang mi stor zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa de dang nam yang mi 'bral bar shog cig /ji ltar dus gsum gyi
sangs rgyas de dag bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba ltar bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas kyang 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams thams cad la rjes
su yi rang ngo / /nam 'chi bar nges pa'i dus de na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyi zhal mngon sum du mthong nas phyag
g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste bdag gi spyi bor bzhag nas lung nod par gyur cig/ bdag gis kyang nyon mongs pas sems mi 'khrul par chos bdag med pa dang
mthun pa'i 'dun pa can dang / byang chub kyi sems tshad med pa dang ldan bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed par shog cig /mdor na bag chags ma lus kun byang nas/ /bsod nams
ye shes tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs te/ /'gro ba ma lus byin gyis bsgral ba'i phyir/ /bdag nyid myur du mngon par sangs rgyas shog /dpang skong phyag brgya pa rdzogs so/ /
bod du dam pa'i chos 'byung ba'i snga ltas su lha tho tho ri snyan shal gyi sku ring la pho brang yum bu bla mkhar du nam mkha' las babs/ mi rabs lnga na 'di'i don shes pa
'ong zhes rmi lam du lung bstan te chos kyi dbu brnyes so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya a tsin+t+ya rA dza sU tra nA ma mahA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags
pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis
thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+ha na chos kyi dbye dgon pa na/ byang chub kyi snying po na seng ge'i khri rdo rje dang / nor bu rin po ches spras pa'i pad+ma'i snying po'i gdan
la bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dge 'dun phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi rdul phra rab snyed
kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po zhes
bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'joms pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje rab tu 'joms pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer shin tu stug po pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer shin tu stug po pad+ma rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bska pa gcig gan gyin
pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras
dag| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od zer me tog
rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'od
zer me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i sku'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'od
zer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes 'od
zer rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bskal pa gcig gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zla ba'i blo gros kyi sangs rgyas
kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ltar bskal pa bgrang ba'i thabs 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis rtsis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rgya mtsho'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa'i tha ma 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i dpal zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba bzang po'i dpal bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi nyin zhag gcig go /kye rgyal ba'i sras
dag| de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
po'i spyod pa can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis thos par 'gyur gyi/ gzhan dag gis ni thos
par mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po dang / thams cad dang ldan
pa'i 'khor de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan
'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal pos gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo
zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya da sha dika an+d+ha kA ra bi d+ha na sa na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa phyogs
bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang na/ ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byams pa dang /
'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' 'khor chen po ngang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs gsol nas/ lhung
bzed dang / chos gos mnabs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por
bsod snyoms la gshegs so/ /de'i tshe na shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal zhes bya ba zhig bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shing rta la zhon nas ser skya'i gnas grong khyer chen po nas
phyir byung ba dang / shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas gshegs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang shing rta
de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di na bdag gi pha ma gnyis gnyid log pa dang / ma log pa dag la mi ma lags pa
rnams rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid la/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang gang gi tshe ljongs kyi phyogs gzhan du mchi ba'i tshe/ bdag la'ang chom rkun pa dag rnam par 'tshe
bar bgyid cing / gcan zan dag kyang rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du ci nas kyang bdag la mi'am/ mi ma lags pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa 'ga' yang rnam par 'tshe bar mi
bgyid pa de ltar bdag la legs par bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ bsrung ba'i cho ga'ang bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab
gsal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar 'tshal lo
zhes gsol nas/ shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gzhon nu/ shar phyogs
logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams nyon mongs pa thams cad bskyod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ /de na de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes spyod ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu/ khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir
shar phyogs su 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag 'tshal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing song na khyod
la 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe ma g.yengs par de yid la byas na khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thub pa che/ /rje la rab tu phyag btsal te/ /rtag tu de na mngon byed cing / /'gro na
khyod la 'jigs mi 'byung / /gzhon nu/ lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu khri 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mun pa dang / mun nag gi
tshogs bcom pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pa yid la mdzad pa rnam grangs bsnyengs
pa dang | bag tsha ba dang bral bas mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu/ khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir lho phyogs su
'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag btsal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing / khyim la sogs pa'i yid
la byed pa dang bral ba rnam par ma g.yengs pa yid la byed pas song na/ khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing / khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang
'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /khyim gyi bsam pa rnams dang ni/ /kun nas ldang ba kun bral zhing / /
lho phyogs su ni 'gro ba na/ /khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gzhon nu/ nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na
'jig rten gyi khams yul phebs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kho na dang / rgyags pa rnam par gnon pa zhes
bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu/ khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag btsal te dran
par byas shing mdun du byas nas sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing zag pa med pa dang / rnam par ma g.yengs pa dang / dran pas khyod song na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang
'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /chos 'ga' skyes pa yod min zhing / /'ga' yang 'gag par mi 'gyur
te| |gang gis chos rnams de ltar shes/ /de la 'jigs pa ci yang med/ /gzhon nu/ byang phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag stong
'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
gzugs bkod 'od gnon zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu/ khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byang phyogs su 'gro na/ de'i
tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag btsal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g.yengs par yid la byed pas song
na| khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing / khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su
bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /rtag tu sems can thams cad la/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi sems byos la/ /sems can de lam brnyas dang / /khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi
'gyur/ /gzhon nu/ byang shar gyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bdud kyi sde bcom pa zhes
bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud dang / yid gnyis kun 'joms rnam gnon zhes bya ba da ltar
bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ bdud
kyi ris kyi lha ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par mdzad de/ gzhon nu/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub kyi
shing drung du bzhugs pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byung ba yin no/ /gzhon nu/ khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir byang shar gyi phyogs su 'gro na de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
de la phyag btsal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma yengs pas song na khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par
'gyur zhing / khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /gang gis dang po'i thugs
kyis ni/ /bdud rnams pham mdzad sangs rgyas de/ /dran bzhin du ni khyod song na/ /khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gzhon nu/ shar lho'i phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi
zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyi khri 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas sems dang po bskyed pas phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba'i dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu/ de bzhin gshegs pa
des dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas pa nyid kyi bar du bar chad med par sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa kun tu
bsten/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan bsgrubs/ shes rab spyad de/ gzhon na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa de'i skyes bu'i rtsal de lta bu byung ba yin no/ /gzhon nu/
khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir shar lho'i phyogs su 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la yan lag lngas phyag btsal te/ phyis khyim nas song zhig
dang | khyod la phyis 'gyod pa'am/ 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par ma g.yengs pas yid la byed na/ khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub
par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /yan lag lngas ni phyag btsal te/ /phyi nas khyim nas song zhig dang / /chom
rkun rnams kyis khyod kun tu/ /zil gyis mi non 'gro bar 'gyur/ /gzhon nu/ lho nub kyi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum khri 'das pa na
'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdugs
'phags snang zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu/ khyod gang gi tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir lho nub kyi phyogs su 'gro na/ de'i tshe khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de
la phyag btsal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te/ sems kyi rgyun gyis de mngon du byed cing rnam par ma g.yengs pa'i yid la byed pas song na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang
'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing khyod bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /rdzogs sangs
rgyas la phyag btsal nas/ /me tog sil mas gtor cig dang / /khyod ni lho nub 'gro ba na/ /'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzhon nu/ nub byang gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas
kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs dag rab gnas mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu/ de bzhin gshegs pa
de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni mi gtsang ba med pa/ 'khrig pa med pa/ bud med med pa/ tsher ma dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo med pa/ snyigs ma lnga med pa yin no/ /gzhon nu/ khyod gang gi
tshe bya ba 'ga' zhig gi phyir nub byang gi phyogs su 'gro na tshangs par spyod pa yang dag par blangs nas phyis khyim nas rnam par ma g.yengs pa'i yid la byed pas
song zhig dang / gzhon nu/ khyed bya ba gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i bya ba de 'grub par 'gyur zhing khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /tshangs spyod yang dag blangs byas te/ /phyi nas khyim nas song zhig dang / /khyod ni gang dang gar 'gro yang / /chom rkun rnams kyis zil mi
non| |gzhon nu/ steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams dmigs pa med pa yid la byed
pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skrag med mun bral ting nge 'dzin mngon 'phags rgyal po zhes bya ba da
ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la phyag btsal te dran par byas shing mdun du byas te 'dug kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / sems
can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas shing gnas na khyod la 'jigs pa gang nas kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /khyod kyis ma yengs yid byed kyis/ /rtag tu rgyal ba de dran zhing / /rtag tu byams pa'i sems byos dang / /khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung
mi 'gyur /gzhon nu/ 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing dgu khri nyis stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan
pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang po sems bskyed the tshom gcod mdzad nyon mongs bskyod ces bya ba de
ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/ /gzhon nu/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bya ba rtsom pa thams cad dang / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / 'chag kyang rung ste/ spyod
lam thams cad du phyag 'tshol cig /yid la byos shig dang / sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems sgrubs shig dang / gzhon nu/ khyod la 'jigs pa
'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / dgos pa thams cad kyang 'bad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di bka' stsal to/ /
bya ba kun la nyin mtshan du/ /sangs rgyas de ni dran bya zhing / /byang chub sems kyang ma gtang dang / /khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur/ /gzhon nu/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan legs par bzung bar bgyis shig/ legs par bcad bar gyis shig/ legs par kun
chub par gyis shig dang / 'jigs pa dang / bag tsha ba'am/ spu zing zhes byed pa gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad khyod la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa
dang | bcom ldan 'das la shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan rnams bzung lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag mun pa ma mchis shing / bcom ldan 'das/
bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag kyang / dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar
'khor rnams la chos ston pa bzhin du mthong ngo / /de nas 'khor de las shAkya gzhon nu bzhin rab gsal la sogs pa skye bo phal po che'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das la ba lta ba
dang | phyag 'tshal ba dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor der 'dus par gyur pa'i srog chags stong tshang ba de dag thams cad
stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis don gyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pas/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la phyogs de dag
dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang mun pa ma mchis par gda' la/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / dper na/ da ltar
de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa 'di bzhin du gda'o/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/ pus mo
g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan rnams thos nas mig rnam par dag cing phyogs bcu dag na
'jig rten gyi khams gang dag mchis pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong ba de dag gi mig rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams de dag/ /bcom ldan 'das/
ci lags/ tshe rabs gzhan du tshe 'phos na'ang 'bral bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems
dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'di ltar mig rnam par dag pa de dag ni sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid du
'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis srog chags stong tshangs ba 'di mthong ngam/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan bzung pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis re res
kyang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag byed du bcug nas srid pa tha ma dang / lus tha ma la byang chub kyi chogs thams cad rdzogs par byas te/ bskal pa gcig
la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyan dag pas brgyan pa zhes bya bar mtshan mthun pa sha stag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de rnams lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen
po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur te/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ 'ur 'ur/ rab
tu bur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg /kun tu rab tu ldeg /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /sa
bla'i lha rnams kyis kyang / kye ma grogs po dag /'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan bzung ba tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
